## Business Question

What’s the business question you want the EDA to answer?  
(e.g. “Which customer segments respond best to coupons?”,  
“Which cities show the highest margin per order?”)

## Data Dimensions Involved

- Metrics (e.g. revenue, orders, satisfaction):
- Dimensions (e.g. warehouse, city, month, coupon type):

## Priority

- [ ] Nice to have
- [ ] Useful
- [ ] High-impact for decision-making

## Any Example or Mock

If you have an example table or chart in mind, describe it or attach a reference.

## Additional Context

Who is the audience for this (CXO, product, operations, etc.)?
